meanings.definition: A person who is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: The group of aficionados gathered to discuss their favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: Music aficionados enjoy attending concerts and collecting vinyl records.
meanings.sent3: The cooking aficionados had a heated debate about the best way to make scrambled eggs.
meanings.sent4: She was a true aficionado of classic literature, devouring books like a hungry lion.
meanings.sent5: The garden aficionados could identify every plant in the botanical garden.
